Thumbs.db

.Rproj.user/
*.Rproj
.Rhistory
.RData
.Ruserdata

# ===== Output files (generated by your R SNP plot script) =====
*.pdf
*.png
*.xlsx
*.csv
*.txt
*.log

*~
*.bak
*.swp
*.tmp
*.old

*.fai
*.aln

*.nsq
